title: When I'm Over You
lyrics:
Ooh, ooh
Wanna fight, wanna get right
Wanna live, wanna never die
Gonna twist on the inside the way I do
Do the thing in a new way
Forget the words that I heard you say

Tell myself it's a new day until it’s true



Till I see the shape shift

And I feel the weight lift



Someday, someday

Someway, someway

When I'm over you

Someday, someday

Someway, someway

When I'm over you

Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh

When I’m over you



Make love like the first time

Get high on my own supply

Dream on or the dream dies

That's the move



'Cause I see the shape shift

And I feel the weight lift



Someday, someday

Some way, some way

When I'm over you

Someday, someday

Some way, some way

When I'm over you

Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh

When I'm over you

Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh

When I'm over you



'Cause I see the shape shift

And I can feel the weight lift



Someday, someday

Some way, some way

When I’m over you

Someday, someday

Some way, some way

When I’m over you
